meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of imperialism.
meanings.sent1: The imperialistic ruler conquered many lands.
meanings.sent2: The country's imperialistic policies led to conflicts with neighboring nations.
meanings.sent3: The imperialistic cat believed the entire house belonged to it.
meanings.sent4: Her imperialistic attitude towards sharing her toys made her unpopular.
meanings.sent5: The imperialistic ambitions of the company knew no bounds.

meanings.sent1: The imperialistic group called for expanding their territory.
meanings.sent2: He was known for his imperialistic views on colonization.
meanings.sent3: The imperialistic squirrel hoarded all the nuts in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her imperialistic approach to leadership alienated her team.
meanings.sent5: The imperialistic propaganda glorified the conquests of the empire.
